items.en: 'It's a mystery' - why Premier League teams haven't played every club yet
items.text_for_match: 'It's a mystery' - why Premier League teams haven't played every club yet BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team explains why Premier League teams have not played every opponent yet despite being at the midway point in the season. BBC Sport's Ask Me Anything team explains why Premier League teams have not played every opponent yet despite being at the midway point in the season.

items.ja: Wiegman gets honorary damehood in New Year Honours
items.en: Wiegman gets honorary damehood in New Year Honours
items.text_for_match: Wiegman gets honorary damehood in New Year Honours Ice skaters Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean become a dame and knight in the New Year Honours list, while England women's manager Sarina Wiegman is made an honorary dame. Ice skaters Jayne Torvill and Christopher Dean become a dame and knight in the New Year Honours list, while England women's manager Sarina Wiegman is made an honorary dame.
